languages.text: {n}Что-то — или ваш тон, или переполненные ядом слова — на мгновение лишают Кунрада выдержки: из под маски холодного профессионала сверкает исполненная ненависти ярость.{/n} "Убогость? Что ты знаешь об убогости, шавка Теодоры? Надеешься купить крупицу ее снисхождения своей собачьей верностью? О, мне знакомо это заблуждение — но, слава богам, больше оно надо мной не властно. Человечество может катиться в пропасть — я больше не служу смертным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Что-то — или ваш тон, или переполненные ядом слова — на мгновение лишают Кунрада выдержки: из под маски холодного профессионала сверкает исполненная ненависти ярость.{/n} "Убогость? Что ты знаешь об убогости, шавка Теодоры? Надеешься купить крупицу ее снисхождения своей собачьей верностью? О, мне знакомо это заблуждение — но, слава богам, больше оно надо мной не властно. Человечество может катиться в пропасть — я больше не служу смертным".

languages.text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то — или ваш тон, или переполненные ядом слова — на мгновение лишают Кунрада выдержки: из под маски холодного профессионала сверкает исполненная ненависти ярость.{/n} "Убогость? Что ты знаешь об убогости, шавка Теодоры? Надеешься купить крупицу ее снисхождения своей собачьей верностью? О, мне знакомо это заблуждение — но, слава богам, больше оно надо мной не властно. Человечество может катиться в пропасть — я больше не служу смертным".

traits.locale_text: "I am the one who was betrayed! I had served Theodora for many long years... and how did she repay me? She robbed me of the slightest chance I had to take her place someday. All because of a single mistake... a single outsider I had overlooked among thousands of her crew! But her hubris backfired — she was so sure that this affront would not shake my loyalty to her house. And she ordered me to track down every last wretch with a drop of her blood — me and her fool of a Seneschal. I bought every {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk I could get to, I used my agents to search the entire Calixis Sector and the Koronos Expanse... and ensured that the heirs I discovered would meet a swift and unexpected demise. All of them. Except for you and Edelthrad, because it was Seneschal Werserian who found you!"

"I am the one who was betrayed! I had served Theodora for many long years... and how did she repay me? She robbed me of the slightest chance I had to take her place someday. All because of a single mistake... a single outsider I had overlooked among thousands of her crew! But her hubris backfired — she was so sure that this affront would not shake my loyalty to her house. And she ordered me to track down every last wretch with a drop of her blood — me and her fool of a Seneschal. I bought every {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk I could get to, I used my agents to search the entire Calixis Sector and the Koronos Expanse... and ensured that the heirs I discovered would meet a swift and unexpected demise. All of them. Except for you and Edelthrad, because it was Seneschal Werserian who found you!"

{n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off his nerve for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

languages.text: {n}或许是你鄙夷的语气，又或许是你充满侮辱的言辞，让昆拉德大为光火。那一瞬间，他撕下了冷漠的面具，眼中燃烧着仇恨的怒火。{/n}“可恶？你真的知道什么是可悲吗，西奥多拉的小崽子？你是不是打算用你盲目的忠诚，来换取她的一丝青睐？噢，我很清楚这种错觉是什么感觉。不过，感谢诸神，我已经摆脱了这样的幻觉。人类只要统统去死就好了，我已经不再为凡人服务了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

traits.locale_text: {n}或许是你鄙夷的语气，又或许是你充满侮辱的言辞，让昆拉德大为光火。那一瞬间，他撕下了冷漠的面具，眼中燃烧着仇恨的怒火。{/n}“可恶？你真的知道什么是可悲吗，西奥多拉的小崽子？你是不是打算用你盲目的忠诚，来换取她的一丝青睐？噢，我很清楚这种错觉是什么感觉。不过，感谢诸神，我已经摆脱了这样的幻觉。人类只要统统去死就好了，我已经不再为凡人服务了。”

languages.text: {n}Algo, ya sea tu tono o tus palabras envenenadas, descoloca a Kunrad durante un momento, y una furia cargada de odio arde bajo su fría máscara de profesionalidad.{/n} «¿Miserable? ¿Qué sabrás tú de la miseria, perr{mf|o|a} de Theodora? ¿Esperas ganarte un ápice de indulgencia con esa lealtad ciega? Oh, conozco bien esa ilusión... pero, gracias a los dioses, ya no tiene ningún poder sobre mí. Que la Humanidad se pudra; yo ya no sirvo a los mortales».
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo, ya sea tu tono o tus palabras envenenadas, descoloca a Kunrad durante un momento, y una furia cargada de odio arde bajo su fría máscara de profesionalidad.{/n} «¿Miserable? ¿Qué sabrás tú de la miseria, perr{mf|o|a} de Theodora? ¿Esperas ganarte un ápice de indulgencia con esa lealtad ciega? Oh, conozco bien esa ilusión... pero, gracias a los dioses, ya no tiene ningún poder sobre mí. Que la Humanidad se pudra; yo ya no sirvo a los mortales».

languages.text: {n}あなたの口調か毒々しい言葉かがクンラッドを一瞬動揺させる。冷静なプロフェッショナルの仮面の下から憎悪の炎が燃え上がる。{/n}「惨めだと？惨めさについて何を知っているんだ、シオドーラの犬め？盲目的な忠誠心で彼女の寛大さの欠片でも買おうというのか？ああ、この妄想なら私も知っているが、もはや私を支配できる力にならない。人類は腐ってしまえばいい。私はもう死ぬ運命にある者には仕えない」
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

traits.locale_text: {n}何か、つまりあなたの声のトーンまたは毒のある言葉が冷たいプロの仮面の下から憎しみに満ちた怒りが燃え上がると、クンラッドを一瞬振り落とす。{/n}「惨めか？ 惨めさについて何を知っているんだ？テオドラの呪いか？盲目的な忠誠心で彼女の免罪符を一粒でも買おうとしているのか？ああ、私はこの妄想を知っているが、神に感謝する。これはもはや私を支配する力はない。人類は腐る可能性がある。私はもう死ぬ運命にある者には仕えない。
{n}あなたの口調か毒々しい言葉かがクンラッドを一瞬動揺させる。冷静なプロフェッショナルの仮面の下から憎悪の炎が燃え上がる。{/n}「惨めだと？惨めさについて何を知っているんだ、シオドーラの犬め？盲目的な忠誠心で彼女の寛大さの欠片でも買おうというのか？ああ、この妄想なら私も知っているが、もはや私を支配できる力にならない。人類は腐ってしまえばいい。私はもう死ぬ運命にある者には仕えない」

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose dans le ton de votre voix ou dans vos paroles venimeuses déstabilise brièvement Kunrad, dont les yeux flamboient de fureur derrière son masque de professionnalisme.{/n} « Misérable ? Que savez-vous de la misère, vous, {mf|le bâtard|la bâtarde} de Théodora ? Espérez-vous que votre loyauté aveugle vous vaudra une once de son indulgence ? Oh, je connais cette illusion, mais les dieux soient loués, elle n'a plus d'emprise sur moi. L'humanité peut bien disparaître... je ne suis plus au service des mortels. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

Oh, je connais cette illusion, mais les dieux soient loués, elle n'a plus d'emprise sur moi. L'humanité peut bien disparaître... je ne suis plus au service des mortels. »

languages.text: {n}Etwas – entweder dein Tonfall oder die bösartigen Worte – bringen Kunrad kurzzeitig aus dem Konzept, und unter der Maske eines eiskalten Profis lodert hasserfüllter Zorn auf.{/n} "Verkommen? Das müsst Ihr Schoßhündchen von Theodora gerade sagen! Wollt Ihr Euch mit Eurer blinden Treue ein Körnchen ihrer Zuwendung erkaufen? Oh, ich kenne diese Illusion – aber dank der Götter hat sie keine Macht mehr über mich. Die Menschheit soll verrotten – ich diene nicht länger Sterblichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

languages.text: {n}Ya ses tonundaki ya da zehir saçan sözlerindeki bir şey Kunrad'ı bir anlığına gafil avlıyor ve o sakin profesyonellik maskesi düşüp kin dolu bir öfke dışarı taşıyor.{/n} "Sefil mi? Sen sefaletten ne anlarsın ki Theodora'nın iti? Körü körüne sadakat gösterince lütfedip sana o engin hoşgörüsünden bir zerre tattıracağını mı sandın? Bu aldanmaları iyi bilirim ama tanrılara şükürler olsun ki artık üzerimde güçleri kalmadı. İnsanlık kendi pisliğinde boğulsun. Artık fânilere hizmet etmiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Something — either your tone or the venomous words — throws Kunrad off for a moment, as hateful fury blazes from beneath the mask of a cold professional.{/n} "Wretched? What do you know about wretchedness, Theodora's cur? Are you hoping to buy a grain of her indulgence with your blind loyalty? Oh, I know this delusion — but, thank the gods, it no longer has power over me. Humanity can rot — I no longer serve mortalkind."

Sen sefaletten ne anlarsın ki Theodora'nın iti? Körü körüne sadakat gösterince lütfedip sana o engin hoşgörüsünden bir zerre tattıracağını mı sandın? Bu aldanmaları iyi bilirim ama tanrılara şükürler olsun ki artık üzerimde güçleri kalmadı. İnsanlık kendi pisliğinde boğulsun. Artık fânilere hizmet etmiyorum."
